name: Masterpiece Mockery
description:
You are in training for a job in a famous art gallery. You've been given the task to work out if new paintings coming into the gallery are counterfeit or not.

Use your deduction skills and your knowledge of each of the artists to work out which of the artworks are fakes.

Use the camera to take a picture of the area of the painting you think is fake and then click on a section of the artist description to give your reasoning.  If you believe the art is real, select the artist's name and press ENTER.

Controls

  • Left Click - Pick up object
  • Backspace - Put down object
  • Right Click and Move Mouse - Rotate the Object
  • Space - Take a photo
  • Enter - Submit your Guess
